article:
Jerry was always in a good mood. _ someone was having a bad day, Jerry would tell him how to look on the positive side of the situation.
One day I asked him, "How can you be positive all the time?"
Jerry replied, "Each morning, I say to _ , 'Jerry, you have two choices today. You can choose to be in a good mood or in a bad mood.' I choose to be in a good mood."
Several years later, I heard Jerry was hurt _ three robbers . Luckily, Jerry was sent to the _ quickly.
I asked him what his thought was when the robbery took place. Jerry replied, "As I _ on the floor, I remembered I could choose to live or to die. I choose to live."
"Weren't you _ I asked.
"Yes, I was really afraid when I saw the expressions on the _ of the doctors."
"What did you do?" I asked.
"When a nurse asked if I was allergic to _ . I shouted, 'Bullets !' Over their laughter, I told them, _ "
Thanks to the super medical _ of his doctors, Jerry lived, but also because of his amazing attitude, Attitude, after all, is everything.
